section.title: Getting Started
What is this generator about?
section.simpara: hyperledger-composer-network is all about getting started quickly. Running this generator will build a simple network for Hyperledger Composer. Better than just a boilerplate, the generated file is already tuned with your name, etc…
Read on a give a try.

section.title: What is Yeoman?
section.simpara: Trick question. It’s not a thing. It’s this guy:
Basically, he wears a top hat, lives in your computer, and waits for you to tell him what kind of application you wish to create.

Not every new computer comes with a Yeoman pre-installed. He lives in the [npm](https://npmjs.org) package repository. You only have to ask for him once, then he packs up and moves into your hard drive. Make sure you clean up, he likes new and shiny things.

section.title: Getting To Know Yeoman
section.simpara: Yeoman has a heart of gold. He’s a person with feelings and opinions, but he’s very easy to work with. If you think he’s too opinionated, he can be easily convinced.

If you’d like to get to know Yeoman better and meet some of his friends, [Grunt](http://gruntjs.com) and [Bower](http://bower.io), check out the complete [Getting Started Guide](https://github.com/yeoman/yeoman/wiki/Getting-Started).
